content: व्यस्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Cast or thrown asunder, tossed about; <ls>Māl. 5. 23.</ls> {@--2@} Dispersed, scattered; <ls>U. 5. 14.</ls> {@--3@} Dispelled, cast away. {@--4@} Separated, divided, severed; हिमवति जलधौ च व्यस्ततोयेव गंगा <ls>V. 5. 22.</ls> {@--5@} Taken or considered separately, taken singly (<ab>opp.</ab> समस्त); एभिः समस्तैरपि किमस्य किं पुतर्व्यस्तैः <ls>U. 5</ls>; तदस्ति किं व्यस्तमपि त्रिलोचने <ls>Ku. 5. 72.</ls> {@--6@} Simple, uncompounded (as a word). {@--7@} Manifold, different. {@--8@} Removed, expelled. {@--9@} Agitated, troubled, confused. {@--10@} Disordered, out of order, disarranged. {@--11@} Reversed, upset. {@--12@} Inverse (as ratio). {@--13@} Pervading, inherent in. --स्तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Severally, separately, singly.
